<title>ML-powered Web Platform for Running Eye Lens Power Calculations— ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Learn how we helped build a web platform for running lens power calculations based on a proprietary ML formula. Our solution trains the ML model on historical data to come up with a more accurate prediction of effective lens position." />
